result.title: Roadmap for automated waterborne transport
result.description: Collects results from mainly WP2, WP6 and the-use cases to provide a public roadmap for redesign of more sustainable waterborne transport systems. Identifies the main solutions that can be used, describes benefits and possible costs and exemplifies these in some future transport systems, also on intercontinental transport.
